name: Red Hound Fight Club
description:
In a world where everyone has a unique superpower,
people create a fighting sport to really see what humanity can do with their gifts
This sport is called Mutant Melee .
Kage is a nonmutant but still wishes to be apart of Mutant Melee 
He then finds an opportunity in an amateur team called Red Hound Fight Club.

For Online multiplayer I recommend using Parsec 
(or any other remote play software.)

Also check out the Devlogs for RHFC

Controls:
Player 1:
Z&X to Perform Attacks
or
N&M to Perform Attacks
Arrow Keys to Move

Player 2: 
O&P to Perform Attacks
or
R&T to Perform Attacks
WASD to Move

Controller:
Square&Circle to Perform Attacks
or
X&B to Perform Attacks 
D-Pad Or Left Stick to Move
Press X or A to Jump

Music In This Game: 
"Supermassive" by Infraction
"Push" by Infraction 
"Midnight Party" by Infraction
"Apex" by MOKKA
"Night City" by MOKKA
